name: Pathrise
headline: YC for your career
description: Pathrise is a career accelerator where you don't pay unless you land a job. Job seekers sign up for Pathrise to get weekly career coaching, access the Pathrise network and use our job search automation software.

# Land YourDream Job
Our mentors help you get more interviews and ace them for top companies like Google, Amazon, McKinsey and more.
[Get Started](https://www.pathrise.com/</apply>)
![student smiling](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d21862724092349138065e/60d220ce2fae87395660a9cc_banner-fellow-img.png)
![Junior icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d21862724092349138065e/60d224a677acb3080e0b0406_juniorInverted.svg)
**$83,307**
Average junior base salary
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d21862724092349138065e/60d225b5da07b566b3246894_seniorInverted.svg)
**$199,896**
Average senior base salary

Our fellows work at:

## Work with an industry insider mentor
Your mentor already works for a top tech company. They'll guide you through the entire process of landing your dream job.
### Damola Omotosho
Industry Mentor
Company: Microsoft
### Cassandra Green
Mindset Coach
Company: CoachCrate
### Shane Ray Martin
Negotiation Consultant
Company: Apple, Microsoft, and more

Company: Amazon

Company: Zazzle

[Get Started](https://www.pathrise.com/</apply>)

## Select a track made for you
Your program and strategy is specialized to what you're interested in
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d21862724092349138065e/60d23c053d08b378b4998b92_engineering.svg)
INDUSTRY TRACK
Software Engineering
Navigate the hiring process for different technology stacks, while learning how to approach technical interviews with data structures & algorithms.
[View Track](https://www.pathrise.com/</software-engineering>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d21862724092349138065e/61d39ae6cc7e1e249e3800d4_icon3.svg)
INDUSTRY TRACK
IT and Cybersecurity
Accelerate your Cybersecurity and IT job search by preparing for interviews and tackling challenges. Refine your resume to secure a position in this dynamic field.
[View Track](https://www.pathrise.com/</it-cybersecurity>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d21862724092349138065e/60d23df9917ab350c29128ed_product.svg)
INDUSTRY TRACK
Product Management
Map out a path to a top role by learning about product discovery, metrics, and more. Then learn how to communicate and think through case interviews.
[View Track](https://www.pathrise.com/</product-management>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d21862724092349138065e/60d23e3c0ebd4e882ab4ee7a_data.svg)
INDUSTRY TRACK
Data
Receive advice from expert data scientists on how to tackle machine learning and statistics interviews. Leverage what you learn when you start your new career.
[View Track](https://www.pathrise.com/</data-science>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d21862724092349138065e/60d23e6b770c7e4a3e4623e2_shout.svg)
INDUSTRY TRACK
Marketing
Optimize your job search to land a growth marketing role at a top tech company. Master key topics such as marketing analytics, paid media, SEO and more.
[View Track](https://www.pathrise.com/</marketing>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d21862724092349138065e/610b2ade761d13313051691b_sales-icon.svg)
INDUSTRY TRACK
Sales & Customer Success
Level-up your sales career or learn how to translate your experience to the tech industry by working with Director and VP-level sales leaders from top tech companies. 
[View Track](https://www.pathrise.com/</sales>)

## 1-on-1's with top mentors
Our mentors come from industry leading companies
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d21862724092349138065e/60d2415d7df60fd562c0d27f_advisors.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d21862724092349138065e/60d5fc8d09702a1495547a0f_advisors-mobile.png)
Our network consists of both part-time and full-time mentors. See some of their profiles[here](https://www.pathrise.com/</specialists>).
## Most common questions
You probably have some questions — we have answers
### What is Pathrise?
Pathrise is a career accelerator that works on your behalf to help you land your next job! We use proprietary tech, data-driven strategies, and one-on-one expert mentorship to provide you with resume, interview, networking, and negotiation support. Our fellows typically experience an increase in interview scores, more job offers, and even increased salaries.
### What are the eligibility requirements for Pathrise?
At this time, Pathrise only works with job seekers who are 18 or older and eligible to work in the United States. Beyond that, we look for a commitment to improvement and a baseline level of knowledge or skills to be competitive in your field. While there is no secret formula, we are committed to working with those we feel we can help and at the end of the day, if we’re not sure we can provide you with the value you need and deserve, we may not approve your application.
### What are Pathrise's flexible payment options?
At the end of your Free Trial, your Admissions Manager will walk you through a loan application process with one of the financing providers we work with. Pathrise offers many flexible financing options, among them Income Based Repayment loans, where we only get paid if you get placed first, and have built-in protection in case you lose your job or your income decreases. Your payment accountabilities typically begin 30-60 days after you leave the program and start getting paid in your new job.
‍
The financing provider as well as our team is always standing by if you’re dealing with extenuating circumstances or need some extra flexibility. If you’re a prospective fellow and have additional questions about the Income Based Repayment model, please reach out to info@pathrise.com. If you’re a current Trial fellow, in the full program, or recently placed, reach out to support@pathrise.com
Got more questions? Contact us or read our FAQ[here](https://www.pathrise.com/</help>).

View Track⟨6⟩
### EXPLORE MORE TRACKS

## 1-on-1's with top mentors
Our mentors come from industry leading companies
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d21862724092349138065e/60d2415d7df60fd562c0d27f_advisors.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d21862724092349138065e/60d5fc8d09702a1495547a0f_advisors-mobile.png)
Our network consists of both part-time and full-time mentors. See some of their profileshere⟨18⟩.
## Most common questions
You probably have some questions — we have answers
### What is Pathrise?
Pathrise is a career accelerator that works on your behalf to help you land your next job! We use proprietary tech, data-driven strategies, and one-on-one expert mentorship to provide you with resume, interview, networking, and negotiation support. Our fellows typically experience an increase in interview scores, more job offers, and even increased salaries.
### What are the eligibility requirements for Pathrise?
At this time, Pathrise only works with job seekers who are 18 or older and eligible to work in the United States. Beyond that, we look for a commitment to improvement and a baseline level of knowledge or skills to be competitive in your field. While there is no secret formula, we are committed to working with those we feel we can help and at the end of the day, if we’re not sure we can provide you with the value you need and deserve, we may not approve your application.
### What are Pathrise's flexible payment options?
At the end of your Free Trial, your Admissions Manager will walk you through a loan application process with one of the financing providers we work with. Pathrise offers many flexible financing options, among them Income Based Repayment loans, where we only get paid if you get placed first, and have built-in protection in case you lose your job or your income decreases. Your payment accountabilities typically begin 30-60 days after you leave the program and start getting paid in your new job.
‍
The financing provider as well as our team is always standing by if you’re dealing with extenuating circumstances or need some extra flexibility. If you’re a prospective fellow and have additional questions about the Income Based Repayment model, please reach out to info@pathrise.com. If you’re a current Trial fellow, in the full program, or recently placed, reach out to support@pathrise.com
Got more questions? Contact us or read our FAQhere⟨20⟩.

generated_description:
**Pathrise: Your Career Accelerator**

Founded in 2017 and part of Y Combinator Batch S17, Pathrise operates out of San Francisco with a team of 55 dedicated professionals. Their mission? To be the Y Combinator of your career. 

Pathrise stands out as a career accelerator that only requires payment once you land a job—transforming the job-seeking experience into a partnership. Their approach combines robust weekly coaching, a powerful network, and advanced job search automation software to enhance your chances of landing the job you want.

With an average junior base salary of around $83,307 and seniors pulling in about $199,896, Pathrise has helped over 2,700 fellows across various backgrounds secure competitive positions in the job market. Their services cater to multiple industries, including Software Engineering, Data Science, Marketing, Finance, and more.

What’s impressive about Pathrise is their model of mentorship. Mentors work in significant tech companies such as Google, Amazon, and Microsoft, offering insider knowledge that can help you navigate hiring processes and ace interviews. This means when you’re working with them, you’re getting guidance from seasoned professionals who know the landscape.

The process is straightforward: you apply and get started on your career journey. The team works with you on resume crafting, interview strategies, and offer negotiations—all while ensuring that you only pay if you succeed. Plus, with various flexible financing options, including income-based repayment models, your financial security is considered.

In sum, Pathrise isn't just about finding a job; it’s about transforming your approach to career advancement, offering tangible outcomes and a supportive community dedicated to helping you succeed. For those ready to take the plunge, visit [Pathrise](https://www.pathrise.com) and start reshaping your career today.
